# UIScrollView.IndicatorStyle.black

**Case**

A style of indicator which is black and smaller than the default style.

## Declaration

```swift
case black
```

## Discussion

This style is good against a white content background.

## Constants

- **UIScrollView.IndicatorStyle.default**: The default style of scroll indicator, which is black with a white border.
- **UIScrollView.IndicatorStyle.white**: A style of indicator is white and smaller than the default style.
